verbose_text: In conclusion, to the best of our knowledege, our data demonstrated for the first time that resveratrol effectively improved the survival, relieved the inflammatory response and decreased the acinar necrosis and apoptosis in L-arginine-induced ANP in mice, which may be related to the enhancement of SIRT1 mediated deacetylation of p53 and HSF1.
evidence: resveratrol effectively improved the survival, relieved the inflammatory response
